text: me 90% Conductive hearing impairment 90% Deviation of finger 90% Dolichocephaly 90% Hypertension 90% Madelung deformity 90% Micromelia 90% Myopia 90% Proteinuria 90% Renal insufficiency 90% Short stature 90% Upslanted palpebral fissure 90% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
